description:
You want to improve your English skills in telephoning? You want to improve your confidence when speaking English on the phone? Need to make and take calls in English?

Then this course is for you!

I've been helping English learners become more confident, effective communicators since 2006.

THis course will give you the skills you need to make telephone calls in Englishh.

Together you'll learn to make phone calls in English, to take phone calls, to take messages, connect a caller, and to deal with typical problems.

You'll listen, read, write, and speak.

This course is different from otehr online courses - I'm your personal trainer, your trainer you can keep in your back pocket, ready to help whenever and wherever you need it.

Make the most of this offer! Enrol now!
title: Easy Business English for Telephoning
